name: PST
paper: Mining for Outliers in Sequential Databases. SDM
description: Approach to mine for sequential outliers using Probabilistic Suffix Trees (PST). The key insight is that we can distinguish outliers from non-outliers by only examining the nodes close to the root of the PST
bibtex: @inproceedings{Sun2006MiningFO,title={Mining for Outliers in Sequential Databases},author={Pei Sun and Sanjay Chawla and Bavani Arunasalam},booktitle={SDM},year={2006},}
